Description: Postcard; printed paper; monochrome (black and white) photograph showing Mustafa Pasha barracks at Alexandria.
Producer name: Published by: The Cairo Postcard Trust
Curator's comments: Old card; postally used. Message continues from another card: "Commandants Office & enquired there. They they gave me yours & I stopped to read it. Glad to hear that you had such a good Christmas, dear, & I can't tell you how glad I am that you went to see mother. I only wish you had given me more detail about everything but I suppose I really want too much. I do hope, dear, you like these p.c.s. [postcards] I send you. I think you will like to have some things to remind you or rather...". The message continued on another card. The same view occurs on another postcard in a private collection which is postally used in 1915.
